name: Resident Evil 5: Lost in Nightmares
description:
Resident Evil 5: Lost in Nightmares is an action-shooter game developed by Capcom. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Capcom. On review aggregator Metacritic, Resident Evil 5: Lost in Nightmares has a score of 80. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Resident Evil 5: Lost in Nightmares on PlayStation 3.
